attributes.action: place tighter restrictions on the use of airguns.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Yesterday, I found an airgun pellet embedded in my four year old cats skin. The vet was able to remove it and she is making a good recovery. Poppy was lucky, many more aren't!! It saddens me to think that to some people, this is their idea of fun.
